abstract: Morgan Stanley is not likely to pursue a retail bank acquisition while it scrambles to complete its joint venture with Citigroup brokerage unit Smith Barney, the Morgan Stanley chief executive, John J. Mack, said.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley is not likely to pursue a retail bank acquisition while it scrambles to complete its joint venture with Citigroup brokerage unit Smith Barney, the Morgan Stanley chief executive, John J. Mack, said.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Chief Says No Bank Deals Imminent
